forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: a "restore area defaults" button

comments.text: i've frequently seen people (including myself) mess up their area settings and struggle to colour things back to default. would love a button to restore all area settings to defaul
isn't there a default on the sliders?
for the filter sliders, yes. but i mean how you can resize and colour your "area shapes" in the menu (sun, fog, etc)
gotcha! by the way, it's kind of possible right now: go to an area of yours which still has the original light and is empty, then click on the mountain -> copy paste ..
.. then copy the area. then go back to your other area and paste there, this will paste the light settings.

thread.latestCommentText: .. then copy the area (you may wanna delete the starting rock in it first). then go back to your other area and paste there, this will paste the light settings
